head.name: Toria Gibbs
head.speaker: yes
head.description: Toria Gibbs is a Senior Software Engineer working on Search Infrastructure at Etsy. She's interested in infrastructure development, distributed systems, and information retrieval (including databases and search systems). Toria holds a computer science degree from the University of Waterloo. In her spare time, Toria bakes desserts for her blog and plays American football (even though she is Canadian).

body: Toria Gibbs is a Senior Software Engineer working on Search Infrastructure at Etsy. She's interested in infrastructure development, distributed systems, and information retrieval (including databases and search systems). Toria holds a computer science degree from the University of Waterloo. In her spare time, Toria bakes desserts for her blog and plays American football (even though she is Canadian).
